explains: adj. 因而发生的，随后的
v. 接着发生，因而产生（ensue 的现在分词）

sentences.en: The ensuing argument had been bitter.
The two companies grew tenfold in the ensuing ten years.
sentences.cn: 这两家公司在随后10年里增长了10倍。

sentences.en: He had become separated from his parents in the ensuing panic.
sentences.cn: 在随后的慌乱中他便与父母分散了。
